snippet.title: SwapQuest – Announcement Trailer | PS Vita
snippet.description:
SwapQuest is a captivating new mix of easy-to-learn puzzle mechanics and
old-school RPG elements.
http://www.swapquest.de
The kingdom of Aventana is under attack by a demon cloud known as the Horde. Many legends tell of its destructive power
and how it devoures everything in reach.
Will you become the hero Aventana needs? Can you find the magical sword that is said to be powerful enough to defeat the
Horde? Play as Prince Wilbert or Princess Wilma and go on a journey through the land to become stronger, wiser and braver
as you fight cursed monsters, find invaluable treasures and discover the secrets of Aventana.
